title: The Crook in the Lot: Or the Sovereignty and Wisdom of God Displayed in the Afflictions of Men
description: When calamity and disaster strike as it did on September 11th, many people begin to ask, "Where is God?" and "Why did God allow this to happen?" These are the very questions Thomas Boston addresses in this timeless book. This book includes an introduction and a study guide to maximize the impact of this classic work.
author: Thomas Boston
